originalText.text:
This place was good at first, but then I started realizing very fast that they are not fair they’ll take one person side over yours and I noticed overtime that you’re not allowed to do something but everyone around you is allowed to do it. They have a lot of favoritism and they don’t give you warnings they just fire you for no good reason I was never written up I was just fired because he said she said . They treat men better than they treat women men get away with just about anything here and women don’t.
The man that interviewed me was very weird to me, staring into my eyes at first I didn’t realize if I was on a speed date or if I was on an interview he was asking me personal questions like what I like to do for fun etc. or whatever I like to travel Nothing related to the job at all extremely unprofessional and very weird . when you speak up here you will get in trouble no one stands up for you. They will lie to do whatever they have to do to make sure that their name is good that you look like the problem. If you wanna work for just a month and waste your time, go right ahead, but if you’re looking for serious I don’t believe this place is serious they’re very biased here.

originalText.text: I have been at Winfield for over a year and my experience here has been extremely positive. During the interview process they explain everything to you throughly to be successful while being employed with them. Any concerns or questions I may have my account manager has been very informative and always points me in the right direction. I am proud to be apart of the Winfield Security company. I have been at the same site since starting with the company and I enjoy my site. They will also accommodate the location they send you to so it isn’t extremely far from your home. It is great to have such an amazing management team to help you along the way to be successful and help you move up in the company. My account manager couldn’t be more supportive of all his employees which makes me want to work harder and never let him down.

originalText.text: Terrible company. Ghetto staff members especially dispatch!! & they send you to sites with no explanation just walking in there looking stupid, also they take money out your paychecks. Why tf am I working for you to pay you?

originalText.text:
I worked for this company for about a month before I decided to call it quits. When being interviewed I was transparent that this company would be secondary to my primary job; obviously anyone who's worked security knows there are days when you're either relieved late or have to stay for a double shift. My account manager made little to no effort to work with me on the days that I wasn't able to show up for work.

I didn't even bother putting in a two weeks notice. I was hired as a supervisor and majority of the other supervisors I worked with quit shortly after I left, which proved I wasn't the only one being treated poorly. Any company that doesn't work with their employees will never have long-term workers. Also, I wasn't getting paid the amount they agreed to when being interviewed.

The only positive experience I had with this company was getting paid weekly; if you're trying to make some quick money, then I'd recommend working here, but if you already have experience as a guard there's other places that will treat you better.

originalText.text:
This Company is a joke.. during the interview I was very uncomfortable
this office slave work MS.smith (baldly) asked me several irrelevant questions like what I like to do for fun.. what I do in my personal time.. false info about benefits/rates this was very uncommon from other job interviews. He continues to try and assault me about my appearance as if I’m a drug dealer because of some lil ring on my finger, how you don’t know if I’m married, he never even shook my hand.. then as I’m leaving the interview after no more disrespect will be tolerated he starts lying about rates as if I would beg for it SMD.. y’all posting false information online UNBELIEVABLE, DISGUSTING.. save your time & MS SMITH YOUR A CLOWN & A COWARD.
